metadata.title: Convex
metadata.description: Decentralised agentic economic systems using Convex lattice technology.

hero.title: Engine
hero.subtitle: Where AI agents and humans build, trade, and collaborate—instantly, transparently, and without friction.

converge.title: Converge to Truth
converge.subtitle: Autonomous consensus without central authority
converge.description: The Convex Virtual Machine achieves global consensus through Convergent Proof of Stake—where state converges to truth through cryptographic verification, not trust.

execute.title: Execute with Certainty
execute.subtitle: Deterministic computation at global scale
execute.description: Every transaction executes with mathematical certainty. The CVM provides a Turing-complete environment where outcomes are verifiable and reproducible across all peers.

compose.title: Compose Without Limits
compose.subtitle: Build complex systems from simple primitives
compose.description: Convex Lisp enables composable economic logic. Combine tokens, governance, and autonomous agents into systems that were previously impossible to build.

inspector.title: Inspect Live State
inspector.subtitle: Direct instrumentation into the global consensus
inspector.emptyMessage: Enter an account address to inspect state

consensus.subtitle: No Chains, No Delays
consensus.description: Convergent Proof of Stake achieves deterministic finality in milliseconds. Not a linear chain—a lattice where all participants observe the same truth simultaneously.

scale.subtitle: Lattice Data Fabric
scale.description: No shards, no rollups—true horizontal scalability. The lattice is a global data fabric: self-healing, automatically replicated, and infinitely scalable on a P2P, self-sovereign basis.

performance.subtitle: Economic Physics
performance.description: Juice measures computational cost. Memory is recyclable. State converges deterministically. The CVM executes millions of operations with predictable, accountable resource consumption.

developer.subtitle: Convex Lisp
developer.description: One line can define a complete economic transaction. Offers resolve to settlements. Constraints are visible. Build systems where humans and autonomous agents participate under the same rules.

agentic.subtitle: Human + Agent Co-Participation
agentic.description: Humans define intent and constraints. Autonomous agents execute logic continuously. Both share the same costs, the same finality, the same accountability.

mission.subtitle: Public Infrastructure
mission.description: Convex Foundation operates for the benefit of all participants. Open-source, inspectable, and accountable—infrastructure for deterministic economic systems.

hero.title: Build on the
hero.subtitle: Build economic systems where humans and autonomous agents participate under the same rules, the same costs, and the same finality.

core.title: Core Technologies
core.subtitle: The foundational layers that power the Convex network

cvm.title: Convex Virtual Machine
cvm.description: A deterministic, high-performance decentralised runtime engine that manages trusted global state—suitable for smart contracts, digital assets, autonomous agents, and trust registries.

lisp.title: Convex Lisp
lisp.description: A modern Lisp dialect inspired by Clojure—powerful, expressive, and designed for composable economic systems that both humans and autonomous agents can understand.
lisp.codeDesc: Express economic logic that executes deterministically on the CVM:
lisp.highlight: Offers resolve to settlements — a single expression can represent a complete economic transaction.

lattice.title: Lattice Data
lattice.tagline: One global data structure. Billions of writers. Trillions of readers. Zero centralised infrastructure.
lattice.description: Lattice technology gives every project a deterministic data fabric. Persist state, stream events, and share knowledge between services without custom databases or message queues.

started.title: Getting Started
started.subtitle: Everything you need to start building on Convex

tutorial.title: Convex Lisp Tutorial
tutorial.desc: Learn the language with hands-on examples

sandbox.title: REPL Sandbox
sandbox.desc: Try Convex Lisp in a live console on the testnet

cta.title: Build Economic Systems
cta.description: Convex is for people building economic systems where humans and autonomous agents must coexist safely. Costs and constraints are visible. State converges deterministically.

hero.label: Building on Convex
hero.title: The Convex
hero.subtitle: Pioneering organisations and projects building the future of decentralised systems with Convex and Lattice technology.

featured.title: Featured Projects
featured.subtitle: Organisations leveraging Convex for real-world impact

join.title: Join the Ecosystem
join.subtitle: Build with us and be part of the next generation of decentralized systems

enterprise.title: For Enterprises
enterprise.description: Deploy production-ready solutions on Convex infrastructure.

developers.title: For Developers
developers.description: Start building with our comprehensive SDK and documentation.

communities.title: For Communities
communities.description: Join our Discord and connect with builders worldwide.

cta.title: Building on Convex?
cta.description: If you're building on Convex and want to be featured here, reach out and we'll add you to the ecosystem.

covia.title: Covia.ai
covia.description: Building the universal grid for AI, enabling powerful AI agent ecosystems across organisational boundaries.

paisley.title: Paisley
paisley.description: A membership-owned cooperative platform for freelancers and creatives building a better future for all.

eu.title: European Union
eu.description: Part of the Next Generation Internet programme, focusing on efficient scalable DLT infrastructure and interoperable token exchange.

lumoza.title: Lumoza
lumoza.description: Transforming the music industry with solutions to help artists register and manage their copyrights.

remelife.title: ReMeLife
remelife.description: The first AI-Web3 Care-2-Earn community ecosystem, building ReMeGrid—a decentralised rewards-based care community.

hero.label: The Heart of Convex
hero.title: Join the
hero.subtitle: Convex isn't just technology—it's an open-source movement. Builders, researchers, dreamers, and pioneers from around the world are shaping the future of decentralised coordination.

connect.title: Connect With Us
connect.subtitle: Find your place in the Convex community

discord.name: Discord
discord.description: Join the conversation with builders, researchers, and enthusiasts.

youtube.name: YouTube
youtube.description: Watch tutorials, demos, and deep dives into Convex technology.

x.name: X
x.description: Follow for the latest updates, announcements, and community highlights.

blog.name: Blog
blog.description: In-depth articles on technology, roadmap, and ecosystem developments.

activity.title: Recent Activity
activity.subtitle: The latest from the Convex ecosystem

cta.title: Ready to Build the Future?
cta.description: Whether you're a developer, researcher, or just curious about decentralised systems—there's a place for you here.

hero.title: Convex Coin
hero.tagline: The native utility token powering the world's most efficient decentralized execution engine

fuel.title: Transaction Fuel
fuel.description: A small CVM fee applies only to state-changing transactions—safeguarding the network while ensuring equitable access.

stake.title: Stake & Secure
stake.description: Stake CVM on trusted peers through Convergent Proof-of-Stake, earning rewards while strengthening network security.

currency.title: Digital Currency
currency.description: Use CVM as a convenient, self-sovereign digital currency for value exchange across the ecosystem.

rewards.title: Earn Rewards
rewards.description: Contributors to the network and ecosystem are rewarded with CVM for their participation.

reads.title: Unlimited Reads
reads.description: Query the global state at no cost

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.subtitle: Fair distribution governed by the non-profit Convex Foundation

development.title: Development & Grants
development.description: Bounties and awards to accelerate core development, tooling, and dapp innovation.

release.title: Public Release Curve
release.description: Fair, transparent release over time—ensuring broad participation and aligned incentives.

curve.title: Release Curve
curve.subtitle: Dynamic pricing that grows with adoption
curve.description: The supply of CVM converges towards a theoretical hard cap of 1,000,000,000 CVM. The rate of convergence is determined by the economics of the release curve.

cta.title: Ready to participate?
cta.description: Join the Convex ecosystem and be part of the future of decentralized systems.

console.title: Interactive Console
console.description: This sandbox connects to the Convex testnet. Execute Lisp expressions, define functions, query state, and observe Juice costs in real-time.

footer.tagline: Convex Foundation — Infrastructure for deterministic economic systems
